summary: THE TAILGATE HATCH OPENED WHILE BEING DRIVEN.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THERE WAS NOTHING HE COULD DO.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED A REPLACEMENT VEHICLE OR A BUY BACK.  THE LEFT FRONT DOOR HAD A WINDING SOUND, CAN SEE A GAP, AND DID NOT OPEN PROPERLY.  THE HINGES WERE ADJUSTED.  THE HEATED SEAT WAS INOPERATIVE.  THE REAR HATCH LIGHT HAD COME ON WHEN GOING OVER BUMPY ROADS, AND THE REAR HATCH SWITCH WAS STICKING.  THE REAR HATCH SWITCH WAS REPLACED, AND THE LIFTGATE LOCK ASSEMBLY WAS REPLACED.  SCC
